42 #ifndef TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_HELPERS_HPP
43 #define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_HELPERS_HPP

52 #include "Teuchos_UnitTestBase.hpp"
53 #include "Teuchos_StaticSetupMacro.hpp"

60 #define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME) \
61  class TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest : public Teuchos::UnitTestBase \
62  { \
63  public: \
64  TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest() \
65  : Teuchos::UnitTestBase( #TEST_GROUP, #TEST_NAME ) \
66  {} \
67  virtual void runUnitTestImpl( Teuchos::FancyOStream &out, bool &success ) const; \
68  virtual std::string unitTestFile() const { return __FILE__; } \
69  virtual long int unitTestFileLineNumber() const { return __LINE__; } \
70  }; \
71  \
72  TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest \
73  instance_##TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest; \
74  \
75  void TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest::runUnitTestImpl( \
76  Teuchos::FancyOStream &out, bool &success ) const \
77

84 #define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_DECL(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME, TYPE) \
85  template<class TYPE> \
86  class TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest : public Teuchos::UnitTestBase \
87  { \
88  public: \
89  TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest(const std::string& typeName) \
90  : Teuchos::UnitTestBase( std::string(#TEST_GROUP)+"_"+typeName, #TEST_NAME ) \
91  {} \
92  void runUnitTestImpl( Teuchos::FancyOStream &out, bool &success ) const; \
93  virtual std::string unitTestFile() const { return __FILE__; } \
94  virtual long int unitTestFileLineNumber() const { return __LINE__; } \
95  }; \
96  \
97  template<class TYPE> \
98  void TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest<TYPE>::runUnitTestImpl( \
99  Teuchos::FancyOStream &out, bool &success ) const \
100 
101 
106 #define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME, TYPE) \
107  \
108  template class TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest<TYPE>; \
109  TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest<TYPE> \
110  instance_##TEST_GROUP##_##TYPE##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest(#TYPE);
111 
112 
113 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_FLOAT
114 # define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_FLOAT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME)\
115  TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME, float)
116 #else
117 # define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_FLOAT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME)
118 #endif
119 
120 #define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_DOUBLE(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME)\
121  TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME, double)
122 
123 #if defined(HAVE_TEUCHOS_COMPLEX) && defined(HAVE_TEUCHOS_FLOAT)
124 # define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_COMPLEX_FLOAT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME)\
125  typedef std::complex<float> ComplexFloat; \
126  TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME, ComplexFloat)
127 #else
128 # define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_COMPLEX_FLOAT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME)
129 #endif
130 
131 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_COMPLEX
132 # define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_COMPLEX_DOUBLE(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME)\
133  typedef std::complex<double> ComplexDouble; \
134  TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME, ComplexDouble)
135 #else
136 # define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_COMPLEX_DOUBLE(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME)
137 #endif

145 #define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_REAL_SCALAR_TYPES(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME)\
146  TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_FLOAT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME) \
147  TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_DOUBLE(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME)

155  TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_FLOAT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME) \
156  TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_DOUBLE(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME) \
157  TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_1_INSTANT_COMPLEX_FLOAT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME) \

166 #define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_2_DECL(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME, TYPE1, TYPE2) \
167  template<class TYPE1, class TYPE2> \
168  class TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest : public Teuchos::UnitTestBase \
169  { \
170  public: \
171  TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest( \
172  const std::string& type1Name, \
173  const std::string& type2Name \
174  ) \
175  :Teuchos::UnitTestBase( \
176  std::string(#TEST_GROUP)+"_"+type1Name+"_"+type2Name, #TEST_NAME ) \
177  {} \
178  void runUnitTestImpl( Teuchos::FancyOStream &out, bool &success ) const; \
179  virtual std::string unitTestFile() const { return __FILE__; } \
180  virtual long int unitTestFileLineNumber() const { return __LINE__; } \
181  }; \
182  \
183  template<class TYPE1, class TYPE2> \
184  void TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest<TYPE1,TYPE2>::runUnitTestImpl( \
185  Teuchos::FancyOStream &out, bool &success ) const \
186

191 #define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_2_INSTANT(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME, TYPE1, TYPE2) \
192  \
193  template class TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest<TYPE1, TYPE2 >; \
194  TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest<TYPE1, TYPE2 > \
195  instance_##TEST_GROUP##_##TYPE1##_##TYPE2##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest(#TYPE1,#TYPE2);

203 #define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_3_DECL(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME, TYPE1, TYPE2, TYPE3) \
204  template<class TYPE1, class TYPE2, class TYPE3> \
205  class TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest : public Teuchos::UnitTestBase \
206  { \
207  public: \
208  TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest( \
209  const std::string& type1Name, \
210  const std::string& type2Name, \
211  const std::string& type3Name \
212  ) \
213  :Teuchos::UnitTestBase( \
214  std::string(#TEST_GROUP)+"_"+type1Name+"_"+type2Name+"_"+type3Name, #TEST_NAME ) \
215  {} \
216  void runUnitTestImpl( Teuchos::FancyOStream &out, bool &success ) const; \
217  virtual std::string unitTestFile() const { return __FILE__; } \
218  virtual long int unitTestFileLineNumber() const { return __LINE__; } \
219  }; \
220  \
221  template<class TYPE1, class TYPE2, class TYPE3> \
222  void TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest<TYPE1,TYPE2,TYPE3>::runUnitTestImpl( \
223  Teuchos::FancyOStream &out, bool &success ) const \

231  \
232  template class TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest<TYPE1, TYPE2, TYPE3 >; \
233  TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest<TYPE1, TYPE2, TYPE3 > \

242 #define TEUCHOS_UNIT_TEST_TEMPLATE_4_DECL(TEST_GROUP, TEST_NAME, TYPE1, TYPE2, TYPE3, TYPE4) \
243  template<class TYPE1, class TYPE2, class TYPE3, class TYPE4> \
244  class TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest : public Teuchos::UnitTestBase \
245  { \
246  public: \
247  TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest( \
248  const std::string& type1Name, \
249  const std::string& type2Name, \
250  const std::string& type3Name, \
251  const std::string& type4Name \
252  ) \
253  :Teuchos::UnitTestBase( \
254  std::string(#TEST_GROUP)+"_"+type1Name+"_"+type2Name+"_"+type3Name+"_"+type4Name, #TEST_NAME ) \
255  {} \
256  void runUnitTestImpl( Teuchos::FancyOStream &out, bool &success ) const; \
257  virtual std::string unitTestFile() const { return __FILE__; } \
258  virtual long int unitTestFileLineNumber() const { return __LINE__; } \
259  }; \
260  \
261  template<class TYPE1, class TYPE2, class TYPE3, class TYPE4> \
262  void TEST_GROUP##_##TEST_NAME##_UnitTest<TYPE1,TYPE2,TYPE3,TYPE4>::runUnitTestImpl( \
263  Teuchos::FancyOStream &out, bool &success ) const \
